title: Some Help Is Urgently Needed!
body:
So me being that safety with passwords kid. I like To change my password alot and you have to access your email address linked to your account well i had used my school email address at the time of making this account and now that i have moved schools my old schools tech support have deleted my email account so i went to change it to my new Email address and i cant because i have to use my old one to get a code for changing. 

RIOT PLEASE HELP ME IM A SAFETY FREAK

replies.body: A {{champion:17}} or {{champion:17}}  main don't actually deserve help though do they?

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=l76PAuTN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-03T05:42:12.649+0000)
>
> A {{champion:17}} or {{champion:17}}  main don't actually deserve help though do they?

they dont
lol kid i main jinx go search me in profile and look at that sweet sweet sweet lvl 7 jinx with over 130k MP points{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=im a teemo ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=l76PAuTN,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-03T16:44:19.919+0000)
>
> lol kid i main jinx go search me in profile and look at that sweet sweet sweet lvl 7 jinx with over 130k MP points{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

damn kid you're still scum

> [{quoted}](name=im a teemo ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=l76PAuTN,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-03T16:44:19.919+0000)
>
> lol kid i main jinx go search me in profile and look at that sweet sweet sweet lvl 7 jinx with over 130k MP points{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

OMG I MAIN JINX ASWELLLLL (well at least I do after Nasus and Vayne) ARRE YOU EXCITED FOR STAR GUARDIAN IT LOOKKS SOOOOOOOO COOOOOOOOOLLLLL?!?!?!?! AMIRITE?!?!?!?!????
just went  42/4/3 jinx norm got a penta and 3 quadras go check if you please {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
[Send in a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we can't help you on the boards with your account specific enquiry.
And this, ladies and gentlemen, is why you don't use a school email for anything outside of school...
